app.title: Grade Calculator
app.description: A simple grade calculator for students.

grades.subject: Subject
grades.add-desc: Add a new grade to the list
grades.all-grades-desc: All recent grades are listed here
grades.simulatedWeight-part1: If your next exam is weighted
grades.simulatedWeight-description: If you know the weight of the next exam (or the amount of exams), you can apply this number here.

subjects.subject: Subject
subjects.add-desc: Add a new subject to the list
subjects.notfound: No subjects found, please add a subject first
subjects.passing-subjects-desc: These are the subjects you are passing. Keep up the good work!
subjects.failing-subjects-desc: These are the subjects you are failing. Therefore the subjects you should focus on.

delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this subject? This will also delete all grades associated. This action cannot be undone.

actions.edit-desc: Change the details of the subject
actions.title: Actions

subjects.badge-noweight-not-empty: This subject contains <weightedAmount></weightedAmount> {count, plural, =1 {grade} other {grades}} with a grade sum of <gradeSum></gradeSum>
subjects.badge-weight-not-empty: This subject contains <averageGrade></averageGrade> {count, plural, =1 {grade} other {grades}} with a total weight of <weightedAmount></weightedAmount> and a grade sum of <gradeSum></gradeSum>

relevance.title: Relevant for academic promotion
relevance.description-included: This subject will be <highlight>included</highlight> while calculating the total average
relevance.description-excluded: This subject will be <highlight>ignored</highlight> while calculating the total average

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.description: If grades conflict with your new preferences, they will be adjusted accordingly.
preferences.grade-decimals-description: How many decimals you want to see in your grades
preferences.keep-modals-open-description: If enabled, modals will stay open after submitting a form
preferences.minimum-grade-description: The lowest grade you can get
preferences.maximum-grade-description: The highest grade you can get
preferences.passing-grade-description: The grade you need to pass
preferences.passing-inverse-description: If enabled, the lower grades are considered better
preferences.alert-description: Unsaved changes will be discarded if you close this sheet, please save them below.

clear-data.message: Are you sure you want to delete all subjects and grades in this category? This action cannot be undone. Don't worry, your preferences will be kept.

actions.clear-account-data-warning: Are you sure that you want to clear all of your account data? This action cannot be undone.

invalid-type.number: This field must be a number

errors.no-data-yet-desc: Add some subjects and grades first :>
errors.not-enough-data-yet-desc: {count, plural, =1 {Add at least one grade to view this graph} =3 {Add at least one grade from 3 different subjects to view this graph} other {Not enough grades to view this graph}}
errors.not-enough-data-yet-grade: {count, plural, =1 {Add at least one grade to view this table} other {Not enough grades yet}}
errors.not-enough-data-yet-subject: Add at least one subject to view this table
errors.max-lt-min: The maximum value must be greater than the minimum value
errors.pass-gt-max: The passing grade must be less than the maximum grade
errors.pass-lt-min: The passing grade must be greater than the minimum grade
errors.import-failed: Import failed, maybe the data is invalid
errors.unauthenticated-subject-details: You must be logged in to view subject details
errors.not-enough-data-yet-subject-detail: This subject looks pretty empty so far
errors.subject-not-found: We cannot find the subject you are looking for
errors.must-be-positive: Weight must be a positive number
errors.invalid-email-prompt: This must be a valid e-mail address
errors.try-again-or-contact: Please try again, use a different account or contact <mailbutton></mailbutton> if the issue persists.
errors.no-archived-data: No data has been archived yet. You can archive categories by starting a new term in the settings.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Here you can see an overview of your grades and subjects
overview.subject-description: This is an overview of your grades in this subject
overview.subject-average-grade: This reflects your average grade in this subject.
overview.total-average: This reflects your average grade in all subjects.

subject-overview.title: Subject Overview
subject-overview.description: Here you can see an overview of your subjects
subject-overview.grade-average-desc: This is calculated from all your grades, not considering weights
subject-overview.subject-average-desc: This is calculated from your subject grade averages, considering all weights

required-grades.title: Required Grades
required-grades.description: The grades you need to pass your subjects

getting-started-about.title: Getting Started
getting-started-about.cloud-desc-part5: version, which stores all data locally in your browser.
getting-started-about.cloud-desc-part6: To use the cloud version, you must must log in first. To access the legacy version,

getting-started-tab.title: Getting Started
getting-started-tab.description: You can start using the grade calculator right away

about.title: About this project
about.description: Some boring additional information about this project.
about.short-description-part1: This project is a grade calculator / dashboard. It allows for some customization; for example, you are                          able to define the grading scale yourself. As of right now, it
about.credit-description-part1: This project uses some components from
about.source-code-description: You can find the source code for this project on GitHub.

demo-card.title: Demo
demo-card.description: You can try out different demos here.

landing-page.screenshot-desc: This is what the grade calculator looks like.

auth.magic-link: You can also request a magic link to sign in with your email address.
auth.sign-in-desc: Sign in to your account using one of the providers below.

legacy.description: Check out the legacy version, if you prefer saving your data locally.

auth.check-spam: Make sure to check your spam folder, if you did not receive it.
auth.sent-mail-desc: Your <highlight>magic link</highlight> is on the way! Check your inbox.
auth.sent-mail-might-take-a-moment: It may take a moment to arrive.

add.title: Add category
add.description: Categories separate your grades. Useful if you attend multiple schools.

edit.title: Edit category
edit.description: Edit or delete your categories. You cannot delete the currently selected category.

manage.description: You can manage your categories in this section.

onboarding.title: Onboarding
onboarding.advanced-settings-description: Hit <highlight>Save</highlight> to apply your changes and complete the onboarding. You can change this in the settings at any time.

templates.title: Template
templates.description: Select a template or use the advanced settings.

cookie-policy.title: Cookie Policy
cookie-policy.subtitle: This cookie policy will clarify what cookies are saved and what purpose they serve.
cookie-policy.legal-note: I am not really familiar with legal matters, there is probably a lot of stuff missing here. If you have any questions, feel free to contact me: <maillink>dev@nstr.dev</maillink>

what-is-saved.title: What cookies are saved?
what-is-saved.cookieConsent: cookieConsent (persistent): This cookie is used to display the cookie consent banner.
what-is-saved.nextauth-callback-url: next-auth.callback-url (session): This cookie is used to redirect back to the app after logging in.
what-is-saved.session-and-csrf-tokens: next-auth.csrf-token (session) and next-auth.session-token (persistent): These cookies are used for authentication.
what-is-saved.justification: These cookies are necessary for the web app to function properly. All cookies are administered by us and are not shared with third parties. We do not use any tracking or analytics cookies. Both persistent and session cookies are used.

i-dont-want-cookies.title: I don't want cookies!
i-dont-want-cookies.how-to-clear-cookies: To prevent cookies from being stored, you can disable cookies in your browser settings and clear the cookies off your device.
i-dont-want-cookies.legacy-ad: Alternatively, you are free to use the legacy version of this web app, which does not store any cookies. Note that the legacy version is not actively developed.

create.title: New Term
create.description: You can start a new term and export your current grades, as well as decide what data you wish to keep

options.export-to-file: Export your current data to a <highlight>file</highlight>

archive.title: Archive
archive.description: You are now viewing the data you have archived. You can download or delete it here.
archive.description-empty: You will be able to view archived data here.

warnings.storage-waste: Data storage does not grow on trees.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: The dashboard helps you get an overview of your averages from all your categories.
dashboard.categorylist: Showing data from <categorycount></categorycount> { count, plural, =1 {category} other {categories} }

privacy-policy.subtitle: This privacy policy will clarify how your data is stored, and which purpose it serves.
privacy-policy.legal-note: I am not really familiar with legal matters, there is probably a lot of stuff missing here. If you have any questions, feel free to contact me: <maillink>dev@nstr.dev</maillink>

what-is-collected.title: What data is collected?
what-is-collected.username: Your username <note>(that you use on the service provider you sign in with, e.g. Discord)</note>
what-is-collected.grades: Your grades, subjects and settings <note>(anything you add on this web app)</note>

data-usage.title: How is your data used?
data-usage.description: Your data is used to provide you with the services offered on this web app. It is stored securely and will not be shared with any third party.

storage.title: How is your data stored?
storage.description: Your data is stored in a database, hosted on a server located in Austria.

deletion.title: Can I delete my account and all associated data?
deletion.description: Yes, you can delete your account and all associated data at any time inside the web app, by clicking on Settings, and then choosing Delete Account. This will immediately remove all your data and is irreversible! You can also request a data deletion by contacting me via email:

security.title: Your code is not secure enough for my needs and I do not trust you with my data.
security.description: You are free to use the legacy version of this web app, which does not store any data on a server.
